text: This is a list of the 17 cantons of the Ardèche department, in France. After the reorganisation of the cantons in France, cantons are not subdivisions of the arrondissements so they could have communes that belong to different arrondissements. The following table shows the 17 cantons of the department and the distribution of the communes by arrondissement: INSEE codes Canton Largentière Privas Tournon-sur-Rhône Total 0701 Annonay-1 6 + part of Annonay 6 + part of Annonay 0702 Annonay-2 9 + part of Annonay 9 + part of Annonay 0703 Aubenas-1 15 + part of Aubenas 15 + part of Aubenas 0704 Aubenas-2 14 + part of Aubenas 14 + part of Aubenas 0705 Bourg-Saint-Andéol 9 9 0706 Le Cheylard 13 33 46 0707 Guilherand-Granges 5 5 0708 Lamastre 31 31 0709 Le Pouzin 13 13 0710 Privas 15 15 0711 Sarras 19 19 0712 Le Teil 13 6 19 0713 Thueyts 41 41 0714 Tournon-sur-Rhône 13 13 0715 Vallon-Pont-d'Arc 29 1 30 0716 Les Vans 35 35 0717 La Voulte-sur-Rhône 8 9 17 148 65 126 339 ==References== Category:France-related lists Ardeche department
title: Cantons of the Ardèche department
